testcase.name: 1 - Conultar el listado completo de comentarios
2 - Crear un comentario
testcase.system-out: * url baseUrl ............................................................. passed * path '/comments' ........................................................ passed * def dataResponse = read('classpath:com/co/gorest/comments/response/responseComments.json') . passed * def createPost = call read('classpath:com/co/gorest/posts/feature/posts.feature@createAPost') . passed * def idPost = createPost.idPost .......................................... passed * def dataRequest = read('classpath:com/co/gorest/comments/request/commentsRequest.json') . passed Given header Authorization = 'Bearer ' + accessToken ...................... passed And request dataRequest.createPost ........................................ passed When method post .......................................................... passed Then status 201 ........................................................... passed And match response == dataResponse.responseCommentCreated ................. passed And assert responseTime <= 5000 ........................................... passed * def idComment = response.id ............................................. passed * print 'Identificador del comentario: ' + idComment ..................... passed

testcase.name: 3 - Consulta de comentarios
testcase.system-out: * url baseUrl ............................................................. passed * path '/comments' ........................................................ passed * def dataResponse = read('classpath:com/co/gorest/comments/response/responseComments.json') . passed * def createcomment = call read('classpath:com/co/gorest/comments/feature/comments.feature@createComment') . passed * def idComment = createcomment.idComment ................................. passed * print 'tengo esto : ' + idComment ....................................... passed * print 'mando esto : ' + idComment ...................................... passed Given header Authorization = 'Bearer ' + accessToken ...................... passed And path + idComment ...................................................... passed When method get ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match response == dataResponse.responseCommentCreated2 ................ passed

testcase.name: 3 - Consulta de comentarios
testcase.system-out: * url baseUrl ............................................................. passed * path '/comments' ........................................................ passed * def dataResponse = read('classpath:com/co/gorest/comments/response/responseComments.json') . passed * def createcomment = call read('classpath:com/co/gorest/comments/feature/comments.feature@createComment') . passed * def idComment = createcomment.idComment ................................. passed * print 'tengo esto : ' + idComment ....................................... passed * print 'mando esto : ' + 10010 .......................................... passed Given header Authorization = 'Bearer ' + accessToken ...................... passed And path + 10010 .......................................................... passed When method get ........................................................... passed Then status 404 ........................................................... passed And match response == dataResponse.commentNotRegister ..................... passed
